医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
FDA 批准 lifileucel：肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞治疗晚期黑色素瘤的里程碑美国食品和药物管理局最近批准了 lifileucel，这是第一个针对晚期黑色素瘤的商业化肿瘤浸润淋巴细胞 (TIL) 疗法，标志着癌症治疗的重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/FDA-approval-of-lifileucel-A-milestone-in-tumor-infiltating-lymphocyte-therapy-for-advanced-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/FDA-approval-of-lifileucel-A-milestone-in-tumor-infiltating-lymphcyto-therapy-for-advanced-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4946c092-6502-4376-a047-4df6b905d04c Thu, 18 Jul 2024 22:31:48 -0400 FDA approval of lifileucel: A milestone in tumor-infiltrating lymphocyte therapy for advanced melanoma
疫苗和病毒变化将长期新冠病毒风险降低了 50%，但 Omicron 仍然构成威胁研究表明，疫苗接种和时间变化显着降低了 SARS-CoV-2 感染后急性后遗症的发生率，但在 Omicron 时代仍然存在很大的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Vaccines-and-virus-changes-cut-long-COVID-risk-by-5025-but-Omicron-still-poses-a-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Vaccines-and-virus-changes-cut-long-COVID-risk-by-5025-but-Omicron-still-poses-a-threat.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31a0c3dc-0120-4066-b94d-29c619d7b2eb Thu, 18 Jul 2024 21:54:00 -0400 Vaccines and virus changes cut long COVID risk by 50%, but Omicron still poses a threat
衰老研究取得突破：阻断 IL-11 可延长小鼠寿命并改善健康状况阻断 IL-11 信号传导可延长小鼠的寿命和健康寿命，减少与年龄相关的代谢下降、虚弱和癌症发病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Breakthrough-in-aging-research-Blocking-IL-11-extends-lifespan-and-improves-health-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Breakthrough-in-aging-research-Blocking-IL-11-extends-lifespan-and-improves-health-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71fac7f4-74cf-461d-aedd-709abbcdc783 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 21:38:00 -0400 Breakthrough in aging research: Blocking IL-11 extends lifespan and improves health in mice
采用健康的生活方式可以延长预期寿命并降低医疗费用一项新的研究发现，采取五种健康的生活方式可以显着延长台湾成年人的预期寿命并降低医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Adopting-a-healthy-lifestyle-boosts-life-expectancy-and-cuts-healthcare-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Adopting-a-healthy-lifestyle-boosts-life-expectancy-and-cuts-healthcare-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8373e104-b868-42b5-a7c1-39ebc9e0547c Thu, 18 Jul 2024 21:06:00 -0400 Adopting a healthy lifestyle boosts life expectancy and cuts healthcare costs
探索 GLP-1 疗法在糖尿病和肥胖之外的广阔前景在《观点》中，Daniel Drucker 强调了越来越多的证据，这些证据暗示基于胰高血糖素样肽 1 (GLP-1) 的药物在治疗糖尿病和肥胖以外的疾病方面具有潜力，包括心血管疾病和神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Exploring-the-expanding-horizo​​ns-of-GLP-1-therapies-beyond-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Exploring-the-expanding-horizo​​ns-of-GLP-1-therapies-beyond-diabetes-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69f2d734-ca78-4792-8531-9d1e026480f1 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 20:52:36 -0400 Exploring the expanding horizons of GLP-1 therapies beyond diabetes and obesity
2023 年密歇根护士研究显示状况有所改善，但职业倦怠和虐待现象依然存在密歇根州的护士在 2023 年密歇根州护士研究中表示，与 2022 年相比，工作条件有所改善，但职业倦怠和人手不足的情况仍然很高，近一半的护士报告去年在工作场所发生了虐待行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/2023-Michigan-Nurses-Study-reveals-improved-conditions-but-burnout-and-abuse-persist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/2023-Michigan-Nurses-Study-reveals-improved-conditions-but-burnout-and-abuse-persist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2837dd2f-eb3a-4574-be49-e2cc34f14d4e Thu, 18 Jul 2024 20:47:55 -0400 2023 Michigan Nurses Study reveals improved conditions, but burnout and abuse persist
受欢迎的蘑菇软糖中发现赛洛西宾和未公开的成分为促进大脑功能而出售的蘑菇软糖可能含有非法致幻剂赛洛西宾和标签上未列出的其他有害成分，UVA 健康专家在五人（包括一名 3 岁儿童）生病后发出警告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Psilocybin-and-undisclosure-ingredients-found-in-popular-mushroom-gummies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Psilocybin-and-undisclosure-ingredients-found-in-popular-mushroom-gummies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0a67ce8-8835-4a4a-a66d-ec077ba05fad Thu, 18 Jul 2024 20:39:01 -0400 Psilocybin and undisclosed ingredients found in popular mushroom gummies
多样化的遗传数据揭示了不同人群的健康差异大多数遗传学研究都集中在欧洲血统的人身上，这限制了对基因如何影响其他人群健康的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Diverse-genic-data-Illuminates-health-disparities-across-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Diverse-genic-data-Illuminates-health-disparities-across-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da466858-bd69-489d-86e1-cd94b1230063 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 20:34:44 -0400 Diverse genetic data illuminates health disparities across populations
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：在共和党大会上，健康政策主要是 MIA本周的共和党全国代表大会强调了许多政策问题，但医疗保健不在其中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-At-GOP-convention-health-policy-is-mostly-MIA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-At-GOP-convention-health-policy-is-mostly-MIA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baf16b45-1379-4c72-9a50-a3c077595a2a Thu, 18 Jul 2024 20:21:48 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': At GOP convention, health policy is mostly MIA
首次成功使用改良双层技术治疗儿童弯刀综合征弯刀综合征是一种罕见的先天性心脏病，涉及肺静脉回流异常，即右肺静脉返回下腔静脉而不是左心房。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/First-ever-successful-use-of-modified-double-decker-technique-for-scimitar-syndrome-in-a-child.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/First-ever-successful-use-of-modified-double-decker-technique-for-scimitar-syndrome-in-a-child.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0da08bc-d249-4749-bfeb-f74edcbcf46b Thu, 18 Jul 2024 20:19:10 -0400 First-ever successful use of modified double-decker technique for scimitar syndrome in a child
